description:
This is how to play SC2! The 3DO way!

summary: Star Control 2 as it should be!

description: After installing the flatpak, you must "add non-steam game" to Steam, then launch the game from the Steam Deck UI. Then settings->controls->bottom player set to "Xbox/XInput".
